get.description:
There are a variety of documents that are used within the Purchase Ledger, each with a different status type. These document status types are a pre-defined list, and are common across every instance of Sage 200.

The API endpoint returns details of the document status types that can be used when reading/writing POP documents.

200.description: The details of the POP document status types have been successfully returned.

400.description: There was a problem with the request. Request body will include details.

get.description:
There are a variety of documents that are used within the Purchase Ledger, each with a different type. These document types are a pre-defined list, and are common across every instance of Sage 200.

The API endpoint returns details of the POP invoice credit types that can be used when reading POP invoice credit documents.

200.description: The details of the POP invoice credit types have been successfully returned.

400.description: There was a problem with the request. Request body will include details.

get.description:
Purchase orders can be generated using Generate Purchase Orders, or if using Sage 200 Manufacturing, via MRP (Material Requirements Planning).

The API endpoint returns details of the generation types which determine how a Purchase order can be generated.

200.description: The details of the POP order generation types have been successfully returned.

400.description: There was a problem with the request. Request body will include details.

get.description:
POP documents can be in one of a number of authorisation states. These authorisation state types are a pre-defined list, and are common across every instance of Sage 200.

The API endpoint returns details of the authorisation status types that can be used when reading POP documents.

200.description: The details of the POP authorisation status types have been successfully returned.

400.description: There was a problem with the request. Request body will include details.

get.description: POP documents can be in one of a number of printed states: Not Printed, Printed or Amended.

200.description: The details of the POP document print status types have been successfully returned.

400.description: There was a problem with the request. Request body will include details.

get.description: POP documents process statuses are used to give a high-level view of the progress of an order or return; the values are None, Part or Full.

200.description: The details of the POP document process status types have been successfully returned.

400.description: There was a problem with the request. Request body will include details.

get.description: POP document types are the types of documents available in POP; the values are Order or Return.

200.description: The details of the POP document types have been successfully returned.

400.description: There was a problem with the request. Request body will include details.

get.description: POP intrastat status types are the intrastat statuses; the values are Not Required, Required, Completed, In Progress and Deleted.

200.description: The details of the POP document types have been successfully returned.

400.description: There was a problem with the request. Request body will include details.

get.description: The trade line status is used to determine the invoice/credit or despatch/receipt status of an order line. Values cam be 'None', 'Partially' or 'Fully'.

200.description: The details of the trade line status types have been successfully returned.

400.description: There was a problem with the request. Request body will include details.

get.description:
Additional charges can be added to purchase orders to account for items such as delivery. Within the Sage 200 application, users can setup and maintain the list of additional charges that can be referenced when creating a purchase order.

This API resource can be used to determine what each additional charge is for.

200.description: The details of the POP additional charges have been successfully returned.

400.description: There was a problem with the request. Request body will include details.

x-sage-changelog.title: Enhanced endpoint field
x-sage-changelog.description: This operation now includes the field 'date_time_created'.

get.description:

200.description: The details of the POP delivery address types have been successfully returned.

400.description: There was a problem with the request. Request body will include details.

200.description: The details of the POP delivery address action types have been successfully returned.

400.description: There was a problem with the request. Request body will include details.

get.description: Purchase orders are used to represent the purchase of goods or services from a supplier. They are central to a business and define the terms (price, quantity and times) by which the products or services will be received.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: Unique Id of the POP order.

200.description: Details of purchase order successfully returned.

400.description: There was a problem with the request. Request body will include details.

put.description:
Purchase orders are used to represent the purchase of goods or services from a supplier. They are central to a business and define the terms (price, quantity and times) by which the products or services will be received.

Please note that as each line is updated independently, as part of a PUT request, a failed line will return an error in the API response body, however, all lines prior to this will be updated. Subsequent lines to the error will not be posted.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: Unique Id of the POP order.

200.description: The purchase order was updated. Response body will include the purchase order details.

400.description: There was a problem with the request. Request body will include details.

delete.description: Purchase orders are used to represent the purchase of goods or services from a supplier. They are central to a business and define the terms (price, quantity and times) by which the products or services will be received.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: Unique Id of the purchase order.

200.description: Purchase order was deleted.

400.description: There was a problem with the request. Request body will include details.

post.description: Returns a purchase order with all the default values for a supplier. The API endpoint does not persist the purchase order.

200.description: The purchase order with defaults was successfully returned. Response body will include the supplier details.

400.description: There was a problem with the request. Request body will include details.

put.description: Purchase orders are used to represent the purchase of goods or services from a supplier. They are central to a business and define the terms (price, quantity and times) by which the products or services will be received.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: Unique Id of the purchase order.

200.description: The purchase order was updated. Response body will include the purchase order details.

400.description: There was a problem with the request. Request body will include details.

post.description:
Returns a duplicate purchase order using the purchase order options specified.

This API endpoint creates a draft purchase order which needs to be either:

  • confirmed as a live order by using the PUT pop_orders endpoint with the field 'is_editing' set to false
  • discarded using the DELETE pop_orders endpoint

requestBody.description: The options to duplicate the purchase order.

200.description: The duplicate purchase order was successfully returned. Response body will include the purchase order details.

400.description: There was a problem with the request. Request body will include details.

get.description: All purchase orders contain 'line items' that define what an order consists of (e.g. items on an order). If the contents of an order are modified by adding/updating/deleting order lines, this will affect the overall value of the order.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: Unique Id of the POP order line.

200.description: Details of purchase order line successfully returned.

400.description: There was a problem with the request. Request body will include details.

get.description: Purchase orders are used to represent the purchase of goods or services from a supplier. They are central to a business and define the terms (price, quantity and times) by which the products or services will be received.

200.description: The details of the purchase orders have been successfully returned.

400.description: There was a problem with the request. Request body will include details.

get.description: Gets a subset of purchase order information for populating a lookup.

200.description: Get a collection of purchase orders for populating a lookup.

400.description: There was a problem with the request. Request body will include details.

is_draft.description: Whether it is a draft order.

lock_id.description: The lock Id of the purchase order when passing the 'is_to_lock' expand to the GET operation. This should be passed back within the PUT operation and 'is_editing' is false to remove the lock against the purchase order.

is_editing.description: If this is set to true, and the order is still a draft order, the order will remain as a draft order, otherwise the order is made a confirmed order.

is_credit_limit_exceeded.description: This is true if the supplier's credit limit is exceeded, otherwise it is false.

is_to_sequence_lines.description: If this is set to true, then the order of the line objects in the lines collection will determine the line number (print sequence number) for each line.

document_no.description:
Purchase order document number.

Note: If the POP setting in Sage 200 Professional is to NOT automatically generate numbers, then this property MUST be set.
If the POP setting in Sage 200 Professional is to automatically generate numbers, or you are using Sage 200 Standard (which doesn't allow you to set this option), then setting this on POST will be ignored.

subtotal_goods_value.description: Goods value (sum of stock items and free text).

total_net_value.description: Net value (sum of all line types).

date_time_created.description: The date and time this entity was created (UTC).

date_time_updated.description: The date and time this entity was last updated (UTC).

memos.description:
Memos are sections of text that can be used to make comments about a purchase order.

Multiple memos can be added to each purchase order. The user that created the memo, the date it was created and last updated date and time are also recorded.

A user can also specify if a memo is currently 'Active' or 'Inactive'. This allows a user to keep a record of previous memos without deleting them.

date_time_created.description: The date and time this entity was created (UTC).

date_time_updated.description: The date and time this entity was last updated (UTC).

pop_order.description:
Purchase orders are used to represent the purchase of goods or services from a supplier. They are central to a business and define the terms (price, quantity and times) by which the products or services will be received.

Please note that as each line is updated independently, as part of a PUT request, a failed line will return an error in the API response body, however, all lines prior to this will be updated. Subsequent lines to the error will not be posted.

is_active.description: True if memo status is active, false if it is inactive.

is_to_delete.description: When updating an existing purchase order, whether to delete this memo from the collection of purchase order memos.

created_by.description: The user that created the memo.

date_time_created.description: The date and time this entity was created (UTC).

date_time_updated.description: The date and time this entity was last updated (UTC).

pop_order_memo.description:
Memos are sections of text that can be used to make comments about a purchase order.

Multiple memos can be added to each purchase order. The user that created the memo, the date it was created and last updated date and time are also recorded.

A user can also specify if a memo is currently 'Active' or 'Inactive'. This allows a user to keep a record of previous memos without deleting them.

prices_and_discounts.description: Indicates whether to duplicate prices and discounts for the purchase order.

pop_order_duplicate_flags.description:
Returns a duplicate purchase order using the purchase order options specified.

This API endpoint creates a draft purchase order which needs to be either:

  • confirmed as a live order by using the PUT pop_orders endpoint with the field 'is_editing' set to false
  • discarded using the DELETE pop_orders endpoint

pop_orders_new_request.description: Returns a purchase order with all the default values for a supplier. The API endpoint does not persist the purchase order.

document_status_id.description: Purchase order document status record Id.

lookup_pop_order.description: A subset of purchase order information for populating a lookup.

create_cancelled_line.description: If this is set to true, whether a cancelled line is to be created.

remove_link_to_sop_order_line.description: If this is set to true, whether a linked sales order line is to be removed.

code.description: The stock item code. In case of an additional charge, this can only be set for lines of type EnumLineTypeCharge and is required if description is not specified.

description.description: The item description. This could be stock item description, free text, additional charge or comment. Required for lines of type EnumLineTypeFreeText and EnumLineTypeComment and is required for lines of type EnumLineTypeCharge if code is not specified.

use_description.description: Whether to assign the description to the line, transferred from stock item if stock item specified. For lines of type EnumLineTypeFreeText and EnumLineTypeComment this will always be true.

for_direct_delivery.description: Specifies if line is flagged for direct delivery.

show_on_supplier_docs.description: Specifies if line will show on Supplier documents.

update_prices_at_goods_receipt.description: Specifies if stock item prices are updated when the goods are recieved.

confirmation_intent_type.description: The type of confirmation intent associated with the line.

nominal_reference.description: The nominal reference. Can only be set for lines of type EnumLineTypeStandard, EnumLineTypeFreeText and EnumLineTypeCharge.

nominal_cost_centre.description: The nominal cost centre. Can only be set for lines of type EnumLineTypeStandard, EnumLineTypeFreeText and EnumLineTypeCharge.

nominal_department.description: The nominal department. Can only be set for lines of type EnumLineTypeStandard, EnumLineTypeFreeText and EnumLineTypeCharge.

line_quantity.description: Item quantity.Note: Decimals cannot be used as quantity values for traceable items that use serial numbers. These will be rounded up/down at the time of posting via the API.

buying_unit_id.description: The buying unit record Id. Can only be set for lines of type EnumLineTypeStandard and product of type EnumStockItemTypeStock.

buying_unit_description.description: Buying unit description. Can only be set for lines of type EnumLineTypeFreeText.

discount_percent_specified.description: Whether the discount has been specified as a percentage. Can only be set for lines of type EnumLineTypeStandard or EnumLineTypeFreeText.

discounted_unit_price.description:
The discounted unit price of the line.

This is calculated by subtracting the unit_discount_value from the unit_buying_price.

pricing_unit_id.description: The pricing unit record Id. Can only be set for lines of type EnumLineTypeStandard and product of type EnumStockItemTypeStock.

pricing_unit_description.description: The pricing unit description. Can only be set for lines of type EnumLineTypeStandard where the product type is not EnumStockItemTypeStock.

pricing_unit_multiple.description: The pricing unit ratio to the base unit.

stock_unit_multiple.description: The stock unit ratio to the base unit.

line_total_value.description: The total value of the line.

line_tax_value.description: The tax value of the line.

landed_costs_type.description: The landed costs type of the line.

landed_costs_percentage.description: The percentage of the item's cost which is landed costs (if the landed costs type is Percentage Based).

landed_costs_per_item.description: The amount of the item's cost which is landed costs (if the landed costs type is Value Based).

total_landed_costs_value.description: The total amount of landed costs applied to the line.

is_complete.description: Whether the line has been fully received and invoiced.

is_line_deletable.description: True if you can delete line, otherwise false.

has_linked_order_lines.description: Whether the line is linked to any sales order lines. Use custom expand pop_status to include in the response.

has_requisition_lines.description: Whether the line has requisition lines associated with it. Use custom expand pop_status to include in the response.

nominal_code.description: The purchase order line nominal code. Is only applicable for lines of type EnumLineTypeStandard, EnumLineTypeFreeText and EnumLineTypeCharge.

pop_order.description: The purchase order that the line relates to.

additional_charge.description: The purchase order line additional charge.

requisition_lines_comment.description: The comment for the changes to requisition lines.

cancel_requisition_lines.description: Set this to true to cancel the quantity that can be apportioned to the requisition line, or false to allow a purchase order to be generated again for this quantity.

linked_requisition_lines.description: Set the new quantity to be applied to any linked requisition lines, when updating the quantity on the purchase order line.

linked_order_lines.description: Set the order lines to be unlinked from the purchase order line.

tax_code.description: The tax code associated with the order line. Is only applicable for lines of type EnumLineTypeStandard, EnumLineTypeFreeText and EnumLineTypeCharge.

warehouse.description: The purchase order line warehouse. Is only applicable for lines of type EnumLineTypeStandard and EnumLineTypeFreeText.

requested_delivery_dates.description: The purchase order line requested delivery date(s). Is only applicable for lines of type EnumLineTypeStandard and EnumLineTypeFreeText.

is_to_delete.description: When updating an existing purchase order, whether to delete this line from the collection of purchase order lines.

date_time_created.description: The date and time this entity was created (UTC).

date_time_updated.description: The date and time this entity was last updated (UTC).

pop_order_line.description: All purchase orders contain 'line items' that define what an order consists of (e.g. items on an order). If the contents of an order are modified by adding/updating/deleting order lines, this will affect the overall value of the order.

id.description: Purchase order line requested delivery date Id.

is_to_delete.description: When updating an existing purchase order, whether to delete this requested delivery date from the collection of purchase order line requested delivery dates.

date_time_created.description: The date and time this entity was created (UTC).

date_time_updated.description: The date and time this entity was last updated (UTC).

pop_order_line_requested_delivery_date.description: The purchase order line requested delivery date(s). Is only applicable for lines of type EnumLineTypeStandard and EnumLineTypeFreeText.

id.description: Purchase order line direct delivery address Id.

action_type.description: The action to take for saving delivery addresses (PUT and POST only). Ordinary saves an address; SetDefault saves the address and sets it as the default for new lines. UseDefault will use the default address for a line; OverrideDefault will use a new address as the default and change the address on any existing lines that currently use the default; NoAction will ignore any address changes. If the action_type is not set, Ordinary is assumed.

delivery_address_type.description: The delivery address type. This can be set as Customer (for either a customer's main address or a customer delivery address), Supplier (for a supplier main address) or Free Text. This can be omitted if the action_type is set as UseDefault. NOTE: The Other value is not supported.

customer_delivery_address_id.description: If the delivery_address_type is set to be Customer, and a customer delivery address is required, set the customer_delivery_address_id.

source_id.description: The Id of the linked customer or supplier. Set this when setting delivery_address_type to be Customer or Supplier.

date_time_created.description: The date and time this entity was created (UTC).

date_time_updated.description: The date and time this entity was last updated (UTC).

pop_order_line_direct_delivery_address.description: The direct delivery address. This can only be set on lines of type EnumLineTypeStandard.

id.description: Purchase order return cancelled line record Id.

date_time_created.description: The date and time this entity was created (UTC).

date_time_updated.description: The date and time this entity was last updated (UTC).

pop_cancelled_line.description: A cancelled line holds details of changes to an order or return line.

pop_order_return_supplier_document_no.description: Purchase order return supplier document number.

pop_order_return_invoice_credit_view.description: This resource returns a view of purchase orders and returns and invoices and credit notes

pop_invoice_credit_line_id.description: Purchase order invoice/credit line record Id.

pop_order_return_line_id.description: Purchase order return line record Id.

pop_invoice_credit_document_no.description: Purchase order return invoice/credit document number.

stock_unit_discounted_unit_price.description: The discounted unit price of the line.

pop_order_return_line_invoice_credit_vie.description: This resource returns a view of purchase orders and returns and invoices and credit notes for a line.

pop_receipt_return_line_id.description: Purchase order receipt/return line record Id.

pop_receipt_return_line_user_number.description: The user Id of who performed the receipt.

pop_receipt_return_line_user_name.description: The user name of who performed the receipt.

pop_order_return_line_id.description: Purchase order return line record Id.

pop_order_return_line_buying_unit_descri.description: Purchase order return line buying unit description.

pop_receipt_return_line_invoiced.description: Purchase order receipt/return line invoiced status.

pop_order_return_line_receipt_return_vie.description: This resource returns a view of purchase orders and returns and receipts and returns for a line.

subtotal_goods_value.description: Goods value (sum of stock items and free text).

total_net_value.description: Net value (sum of all line types).

document_discount_percent.description: Document discount percent value, between 0 and 99.99.

document_created_by.description: The person who created the POP Order.

document_originator_id.description: User Id of the document originator.

single_delivery_address.description: True if only one delivery address has been used on the order/return; otherwise False.

date_time_updated.description: The date and time this entity was last updated (UTC).

pop_order_return_view.description: "This resource returns the details of all POP documents (orders and returns). The default sort (orderby) fields are by 'document_no' and 'Id' ascending."

pop_order_id.description: Unique Id of the purchase order.

pop_order_currency_id.description: The Id for the currency used for the purchase order.

pop_order_currency_name.description: The name for the currency used for the purchase order.

pop_order_currency_symbol.description: The symbol of the currency used for the purchase order.

pop_order_exchange_rate.description: Exchange rate for the purchase order.

pop_order_date_time_updated.description: The date and time the purchase order was last updated (UTC).

pop_order_document_originator_id.description: The Id of the POP order originator.

pop_order_document_created_by_id.description: The Id of the user who actually entered the POP order into the system.

pop_order_document_default_delivery_addr.description: The Id of the default delivery addess for the order.

pop_order_document_discount_percent.description: The document discount percent of the POP order.

pop_order_subtotal_value.description: The subtotal value for the POP order.

pop_order_line_landed_costs_value.description: The value of landed costs for the POP order.

pop_order_subtotal_discount_value.description: The subtotal discount value for the POP order.

pop_order_subtotal_landed_costs_value.description: The subtotal landed costs value for the POP order.

pop_order_line_product_description.description: Purchase order line product description. This could be stock item description, free text, additional charge or comment.

pop_order_line_total_value.description: The total value of the line.

pop_order_line_tax_value.description: The tax value of the line.

pop_order_line_discounted_unit_price.description:
The discounted unit price of the line.

This is calculated by subtracting the pop_order_line_unit_discount_value from the pop_order_line_unit_price.

pop_order_confirmation_intent_type.description: The type of confirmation intent associated with the line.

pop_order_line_for_direct_delivery.description: Indicates if POP line is marked for direct delivery.

pop_order_line_show_on_supplier_docs.description: Indicates if POP line will show on supplier documents.

pop_order_line_date_time_updated.description: The date and time the POP order line was last updated (UTC).

pop_delivery_addr_fax.description: POP delivery address line fax number...

product_id.description: The associated product record Id. Only returned where pop_order_line_type = EnumLineTypeStandard.

product_code.description: The code of the product ordered. Only returned where pop_order_line_type = EnumLineTypeStandard.

product_name.description: The name of the product ordered. Only returned where pop_order_line_type = EnumLineTypeStandard.

product_description.description: The associated product description. Only returned where pop_order_line_type = EnumLineTypeStandard.

warehouse_id.description: The Id of the warehouse the product is stored in. Only returned where pop_order_line_type = EnumLineTypeStandard.

warehouse_name.description: The name of the warehouse. Only returned where pop_order_line_type = EnumLineTypeStandard.

tax_code_id.description: The Id of the tax code set on the line.

pop_order_line_view.description:
When making larger requests for purchase order information, the Purchase Order Line Views resource is a faster alternative to the 'Purchase Orders' resource. The Purchase Order Line Views resource returns more information than the 'Purchase Orders' resource, and therefore reduces the number of API requests required to return the same information from multiple resources.

This resource returns a view of purchase orders, purchase order lines, suppliers, products, warehouses, tax codes and currencies that can be queried on any field. The default sort (orderby) field are by 'pop_order_id' and 'pop_order_line_id' descending.

pop_requisition_fulfilment_line_id.description: Unique Id of the purchase requisition fulfilment line.

pop_requisition_fulfilment_line_type_id.description: Unique Id of the purchase requisition fulfilment line type.

pop_requisition_fulfilment_line_quantity.description: The quantity on the requisition fulfilment line.

pop_requisition_fulfilment_line_item_cod.description: The item code on the requisition fulfilment line.

pop_requisition_fulfilment_line_item_nam.description: The item name on the requisition fulfilment line.

pop_requisition_fulfilment_line_linked_i.description: Unique Id of the linked purchase order line on the requisition fulfilment line.

pop_requisition_fulfilment_line_net_valu.description: The net value on the requisition fulfilment line.

pop_requisition_fulfilment_line_nominal_.description: The nominal account name on the requisition fulfilment line.
The nominal account reference on the requisition fulfilment line.
The nominal cost centre on the requisition fulfilment line.
The nominal department on the requisition fulfilment line.

pop_requisition_fulfilment_line_unit_buy.description: The unit buying price on the requisition fulfilment line.

pop_requisition_fulfilment_line_warehous.description: The warehouse name on the requisition fulfilment line.

pop_requisition_fulfilment_line_supplier.description: Unique Id of the supplier on the requisition fulfilment line.

pop_requisition_id.description: Unique Id of the purchase requisition.

pop_requisition_line_net_value.description: The net value on the requisition line.

pop_requisition_line_item_code.description: The stock item code on the requisition line.

pop_requisition_line_item_name.description: The stock item name on the requisition line.

pop_requisition_line_currency_symbol.description: The currency symbol for the currency on the requisition line.

pop_requisition_line_quantity_to_fulfil.description: The quantity to fulfil on the requisition line.

pop_requisition_line_quantity_fulfilled.description: The quantity fulfilled on the requisition line.

pop_requisition_line_status_id.description: Unique Id of the status on the purchase requisition line.

pop_requisition_line_id.description: Unique Id of the purchase requisition line.

pop_requisition_line_delivery_date.description: The delivery date on the purchase requisition line.

pop_requisition_line_authoriser_username.description: The authoriser username on the requisition line.

pop_requisition_line_authorised_date.description: The date the purchase requisition line was authorised.

pop_requisition_date_time_created.description: The date the purchase requisition line was created.

pop_requisition_created_by_username.description: The username the requisition line was created by.

pop_requisition_line_nominal_account_nam.description: The nominal account name on the requisition line.

pop_requisition_line_nominal_account_ref.description: The nominal account reference on the requisition line.

pop_requisition_line_nominal_cost_centre.description: The nominal cost centre on the requisition line.

pop_requisition_line_nominal_department.description: The nominal department on the requisition line.

pop_requisition_line_quantity.description: The quantity on the requisition line.

pop_requisition_line_unit_buying_price.description: The unit buying price on the requisition line.

pop_requisition_line_warehouse_name.description: The warehouse name on the requisition line.

pop_requisition_line_supplier_code.description: The supplier code on the requisition line.

pop_requisition_line_supplier_name.description: The supplier name on the requisition line.

pop_requisition_line_buying_unit_descrip.description: The buying unit description name on the requisition line.

supplier_account_name.description: The supplier account name on the requisition fulfilment line.

supplier_account_number.description: The supplier account number on the requisition fulfilment line.

nominal_report_category_budget_name.description: The nominal budget category name on the requisition line.

stock_item_stock_unit_name.description: The stock item unit linked to the fulfilment line.

pop_requisition_fulfilment_line_view.description: This resource returns a view of requisitions, lines and its fulfilments linked to a purchase order line.

auto_gen_order_return_nos.description: This specifies whether to assign your purchase order numbers automatically.

show_quantity_goods_received.description: This specifies whether to show outstanding order quantities during goods received entry.

amend_analysis_codes.description: This specifies whether to allow amendment of analysis codes on the order line.

amend_nominal_codes.description: This specifies whether to allow amendment of nominal codes on the order line.

user_logon_as_order_taker.description: Indicates whether to use the current user's logon name as the order or return taker.

stock_nominal_account_same_as.description: Indicates whether to use the same nominal code as the the stock item (true) or the supplier's account (false).

use_same_cost_centre_and_department_as_s.description: Indicates whether to use the same cost centre and department as the supplier's account.

variances_nominal_account_reference.description: The nominal code reference for standard cost variances.

variances_nominal_cost_centre.description: The nominal code cost centre for standard cost variances.

variances_nominal_department.description: The nominal code department for standard cost variances.

analyse_postings_by_cost_centre_and_depa.description: If using cost centre breakdown, indicates whether to analyse standard cost variances by cost centre and departments.

match_invoice_credit_to_order_return_onl.description: Indicates whether to match invoices and credit notes to the goods received note (GRN) and to the purchase order or return (false) or whether to match invoices and credit notes directly to the purchase order or return (true).

use_disputed_invoicing.description: Indicates whether to use disputed invoicing to mark invoices as disputed when necessary.

record_cancelled_order_lines.description: Indicates whether to record details of cancelled orders for future analysis. Saves a history of cancelled orders as well as cancelled purchase returns.

auto_print_copy_orders.description: Indicates whether to print copies of purchase orders automatically.

generate_intrastat_entries.description: Indicates whether to generate intrastat entries for purchase orders.

terms_of_delivery_type.description: Indicates the default terms of delivery for Intrastat.

nature_of_transaction_code_id.description: Indicates the Id of the default nature of transaction code for Intrastat.

allow_manual_direct_delivery.description: Indicates whether to allow order entry for goods to be delivered direct from supplier.

allow_direct_delivery_to_customer.description: Indicates whether to allow customer addresses to be used for direct delivery.

allow_direct_delivery_to_supplier.description: Indicates whether to allow supplier addresses to be used for direct delivery.

allow_direct_delivery_to_any_address.description: Indicates whether to allow any address to be used for direct delivery.

price_difference_nominal_code_id.description: The Id of the price difference nominal code account.

update_price_on_goods_receipt.description: Indicates whether to allow prices to be updated when goods are received.

applicable_order_lines_exist.description: Indicates whether there are any Orders that are Live or On-Hold that contain standard or free text lines.

prices_set_at_goods_receipt.description: Indicates whether the default price is updated when the invoice is recorded (false) or when goods are received (true).

use_order_exchange_rate_for_prices.description: Indicates whether to use the order exchange rate when updating prices (true) or the system exchange rate (false).

pop_order_generation_type.description: The default POP Order generation type.

use_single_purchase_order_for_direct_del.description: Indicates whether to print a separate purchase order for each sales order line that uses the Direct To Customer stock fulfilment method.

include_terms_of_delivery_on_intrastat.description: Indictates whether to include terms of delivery on Intrastat entry.

include_statistical_value_on_intrastat.description: Indicates whether to include the statistical value on the Intrastat. This is the value of the goods, adjusted for any landed costs. (Ireland only).

mode_of_transport_id.description: Indicates the Id of the default mode of transport for Intrastat. (Ireland only).

intrastat_date_type.description: Indicates when to include transactions on the Intrastat declaration. (HMRC Northern Ireland only).

include_text_in_accruals.description: Indicates whether to include text order lines in accruals.

include_service_labour_in_accruals.description: Indicates whether to include service/labour order lines in accruals.

include_back_to_back_in_order_generation.description: Indicates whether to generate purchase orders for back to back and direct delivery sales orders.

allow_unauthorised_order_processing.description: Indicates whether to allow unauthorised orders to be processed.

default_free_text_confirm_intent_type.description: The default confirmation type for free text lines.

default_service_labour_confirm_intent_ty.description: The default confirmation type for standard item lines with a service or labour stock item.

amend_header_analysis_codes.description: Indicates whether order header analysis codes can be amended.

exclude_direct_delivery_for_customer.description: Whether direct delivery is ignored when the customer is on hold when using generate orders.

exclude_via_stock_for_customer.description: Whether via stock fulfilment is ignored when the customer is on hold when using generate orders.

exclude_direct_delivery_for_order.description: Whether direct delivery is ignored when the order is on hold when using generate orders.

exclude_via_stock_for_order.description: Whether via stock fulfilment is ignored when the order is on hold when using generate orders.

committed_includes_goods_received.description: Indicates whether committed costs include goods received and goods despatched.

check_budgets_on_authorise.description: Indicates whether to check budgets when authorising purchase orders.

requisition_mandatory_nominal_codes.description: Indicates whether purchase requisitions require a valid nominal account.

requisition_nominals_in_budget.description: Indicates whether the nominal account is included in chosen Combined Nominal Budget. Only available when requisition_mandatory_nominal_codes is true.

requisition_mandatory_supplier.description: Indicates whether purchase requisitions require a valid supplier account.

requisition_authoriser_amend.description: Indicates whether purchase requisitions can be amended by their authoriser.

price_difference_nominal_code.description: The nominal code for price differences.

date_time_created.description: The date and time this entity was created (UTC).

date_time_updated.description: The date and time this entity was last updated (UTC).

pop_settings.description: The POP Settings are used to choose how to process and manage your Purchase Order Processing.

pop_document_status_type.description:
There are a variety of documents that are used within the Purchase Ledger, each with a different status type. These document status types are a pre-defined list, and are common across every instance of Sage 200.

The API endpoint returns details of the document status types that can be used when reading/writing POP documents.

pop_invoice_credit_type.description:
There are a variety of documents that are used within the Purchase Ledger, each with a different type. These document types are a pre-defined list, and are common across every instance of Sage 200.

The API endpoint returns details of the POP invoice credit types that can be used when reading POP invoice credit documents.

pop_order_generation_type.description:
Purchase orders can be generated using Generate Purchase Orders, or if using Sage 200 Manufacturing, via MRP (Material Requirements Planning).

The API endpoint returns details of the generation types which determine how a Purchase order can be generated.

pop_authorisation_status_type.description:
POP documents can be in one of a number of authorisation states. These authorisation state types are a pre-defined list, and are common across every instance of Sage 200.

The API endpoint returns details of the authorisation status types that can be used when reading POP documents.

pop_document_print_status_type.description: POP documents can be in one of a number of printed states: Not Printed, Printed or Amended.

pop_document_process_status_type.description: POP documents process statuses are used to give a high-level view of the progress of an order or return; the values are None, Part or Full.

pop_document_type.description: POP document types are the types of documents available in POP; the values are Order or Return.

pop_intrastat_status_type.description: POP intrastat status types are the intrastat statuses; the values are Not Required, Required, Completed, In Progress and Deleted.

pop_trade_line_status_type.description: The trade line status is used to determine the invoice/credit or despatch/receipt status of an order line. Values cam be 'None', 'Partially' or 'Fully'.

date_time_created.description: The date and time this entity was created (UTC).

date_time_updated.description: The date and time this entity was last updated (UTC).

pop_additional_charge.description:
Additional charges can be added to purchase orders to account for items such as delivery. Within the Sage 200 application, users can setup and maintain the list of additional charges that can be referenced when creating a purchase order.

This API resource can be used to determine what each additional charge is for.

pop_delivery_address_type.description: The delivery address can be one of the following types: Customer, Supplier or Free Text.

pop_delivery_address_action_type.description: The delivery address actions can be one of the following types: NoAction, Ordinary, SetDefault, UseDefault or OverrideDefault.

id.description: POP requisition fulfilment line unique Id.

linked_item_id.description: The Id of a linked purchase order line; if not linked, then 0.

linked_reference.description: If the fulfilment line is linked to a purchase order line, then this will hold the purchase order document number.

pop_requisition_fulfilment_line_type.description: Indicates the fulfilment type. Values could be POPOrder, Stock, Unable to fulfil, and Cancelled.

quantity.description: The quantity on the requisition line.

unit_buying_price.description: The unit buying price on the fulfilment line.

net_value.description: The net value on the fulfilment line.

date_time_created.description: The date and time this entity was created (UTC).

date_time_updated.description: The date and time this entity was last updated (UTC).

pop_requisition_fulfilment_line.description: The POP requisition fulfilment line holds information about the fulfilments of a requisition line.

stock_unit_required_quantity.description: The purchase order quantity required (in stock units).

stock_unit_despatched_quantity.description: The sales order quantity despatched (in stock units).

stock_unit_outstanding_quantity.description: The sales order quantity outstanding (in stock units).

is_to_unlink.description: Set to true, if the line is to be unlinked from the POP line.

pop_linked_order_line.description: The (sales) order line linked to the purchase order line.

id.description: The linked requisition fulfilment line Id.

item_name.description: The stock item name (free text description).

quantity.description: The quantity on the requisition fulfilment line (in stock units).

pop_linked_requisition_line.description: The requisition line linked to the purchase order line.
